name: Would you kill a baby ?
description:
Once the game has loaded and your mouse hasnt locked into the game window yet, click into the game window to take control of the player character.

________________________

Would you kill this baby ?

Move around with WASD.
Once you stannd close enough to the baby, you can use Left Click to kill it.

But will you do that?

This game waas made as part of the Berlin Mini-jam within 8 hours.

The themes were:
You are not the Main-Character
Hopeless
Bananas
